missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} The blue terminal is the weapons console. At the end of each round, if the weapons console is on the map, the weapons console activates laser turrets to fire on the rebels.
{-} A hero can interact with the weapons console ({K}, {I} or {J}) to try and destroy it.
{-} The green terminal is the hyperdrive control. A hero can interact with the hyperdrive control ({I} or {J}) to try and slice the hyperdrive.
{-} The mission will progress when the hyperdrive is sliced.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

events.eventText:
You successfully stowed aboard the Imperial ship and successfully snuck your way into its heart. All you had left to do was sneak your way onto the bridge and disable the hyperdrive, giving Luke time to evacuate from his Sullust hideout. But it was at that point that your luck ran out.

A massive blast at your heels let you know that your presence had been noticed as the shipâ€™s internal defense weapons had activated. As you run to avoid the blasts, a trooper squad moves to head you off as their commander shouts orders at them from the bridge.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} The blue terminal is the weapons console. At the end of each round, if the weapons console is on the map, the weapons console activates laser turrets to fire on the rebels.
{-} A hero can interact with the weapons console ({K}, {I} or {J}) to try and destroy it.
{-} The green terminal is the hyperdrive control. A hero can interact with the hyperdrive control ({I} or {J}) to try and slice the hyperdrive.
{-} The mission will progress when the hyperdrive is sliced.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

You blast away in the stolen shuttle, evading turbolaser fire and TIE fighters until you have time to punch coordinates into the navicomputer and blast into hyperspace. You and the Rebellion's hero are safe.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.mainText: Did you play this mission as part of the "Twin Shadows" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
You try and try to break through the Imperial lines to complete your mission, but you are simply overwhelmed. You scramble into a corner and an officer aims his blaster and demands your surrender. You hope Luke has enough time to escape regardless.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.

eventActions.mainText: Did you play this mission as part of the "Twin Shadows" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
You all yell out in celebration as, through the front window of the cockpit, you see the stars begin to streak from dots to lines as the stolen shuttle boosts into light speed, leaving the deactivated Star Destroyer and frustrated TIE fighters behind.

You rendezvous with your pilot and shuttle with the excellent news of a mission accomplished. Not long after, you receive communication from Luke Skywalker himself.

"Well done, everyone. Thanks to your warning and infiltration operation, we were able to evacuate our position and remove all Alliance data from the area. We're moving out now. Thank you: we all owe you our lives."

In coming days you also communicate the recent events to Alliance Command and come up with a reaction strategy. Should that Star Destroyer return to Tatooine, they will be ready and waiting.

{-} The Rebels win the campaign!

You are surrounded by stormtroopers and officers as the ship's full defenses are alerted to your presence and respond. You are arrested and taken into custody.

Before they confiscate your gear, you hear a communication from your pilot that, although Luke managed to escape the raid in time, he and the other Rebels at the base weren't able to cover their tracks. It seems that the Imperialas got their hands on loads of Alliance data.

The door to your cell slides open and in strides Kayn Somos, the stormtrooper commander. He removes his helmet to reveal an evil, smirking face. In his hands he holds a datapad, and as you are restrained he scrolls the secret Alliance information stolen during the Sullust raid you failed to prevent. You listen in horror as he reads off major Rebel fleet maneuvers and future covert operations involving Luke and Princess Leia. He seems to relish your anger and sadness.

{-} The Rebels lose the campaign.

{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

The doors fly open, and you see Kayn Somos arriving through an elevator, surrounded by troops. "Blast them into oblivion!", the huge commander shouts, pointing at you.

{-} The red terminal is the alarm. At the start of each round, if the alarm is on the map, {D} increases by 2.
{-} The yellow terminal is the surveillance terminal. If the surveillance terminal is on the map, the Empire receives the first activation each round.
{-} A hero can interact with the alarm or the surveillance terminal ({K}, {I} or {J}) to destroy it.
{-} A figure can attack a door to the Hangar (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the Hangar opens.

This door leads to the Surveillance Center.

{-} The door is locked.

This door leads to the War Room.

{-} The door is locked.

One of the control panels on the bridge controls the Star Destroyer's hyperdrive.

{-} A hero can interact with the hyperdrive control ({I} or {J}) to try and slice the hyperdrive.

events.eventText:
The door to the hangar blasts open and reveals just what you were hoping for: A shuttle, ready to launch. Unfortunately, it is locked tight by the docking clamps. 

{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent the shuttle.
{-} A hero can interact with the grey terminal to activate the shuttle.
{-} At the end of any round, if there is at least one healthy hero adjacent to the activated shuttle and there are fewer than 2 Imperial figures adjacent to the shuttle, the heroes steal the shuttle. Click the tokens and select "Steal Shuttle".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes steal the shuttle.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Imperial mission tokens represent the shuttle.
{-} A hero can interact with the grey terminal to activate the shuttle.
{-} At the end of any round, if there is at least one healthy hero adjacent to the activated shuttle and there are fewer than 2 Imperial figures adjacent to the shuttle, the heroes steal the shuttle. Click the tokens and select "Steal Shuttle".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes steal the shuttle.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.tbText: As you look for a way out, more enemies rush in.

events.eventText: Sparks fly out of the console, and black smoke pours out.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The weapons console controls the Star Destroyer's weapons systems, including the automatic defense systems.

{-} At the end of each round, if the weapons console is on the map, the weapons console activates laser turrets to fire on the rebels.
{-} A hero can interact with the weapons console ({K}, {I} or {J}) to try and destroy it.

events.eventText: Sparks fly out of the console, and black smoke pours out.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The console in the War Room sends automatic calls for reinforcements through the ship.

{-} At the start of each round, if the alarm is on the map, {D} increases by 2.
{-} A hero can interact with the alarm terminal ({K}, {I} or {J}) to try and destroy it.

events.eventText: Sparks fly out of the console, and black smoke pours out.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The surveillance terminal allows the Imperials to monitor the rebel movements on the ship.

{-} If the surveillance terminal is on the map, the Empire receives the first activation each round.
{-} A hero can interact with the surveillance terminal ({K}, {I} or {J}) to try and destroy it.

events.eventText:
With the docking clamps released, the shuttles springs to life. All that is left to do is getting rid of any opposition trying to stop you.

{-} The Rebel mission tokens represent the activated shuttle.
{-} At the end of any round, if there is at least one healthy hero adjacent to the activated shuttle and there are fewer than 2 Imperial figures adjacent to the shuttle, the heroes steal the shuttle. Click the tokens and select "Steal Shuttle".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes steal the shuttle.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the hyperdrive.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the hyperdrive control, then discard all strain tokens on the hyperdrive control. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the security protocols keep kicking you out. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the hyperdrive control for each {B} result gained.

eventActions.mainText:
You start deactivate the weapons console.

{-} Test {J}, {K} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the weapons console, then discard all strain tokens on the weapons console. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the console holds. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the weapons console for each {B} result gained.
